entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
